Package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.service

Class DatabaseService

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.db.service.DatabaseService
@Service public class DatabaseService extends Object
Provides services for executing and validating database queries.

This class facilitates database interactions by executing queries, extracting specific data from query responses, and validating results using predefined assertions.

Author:

      @Autowired public DatabaseService(JsonPathExtractor jsonPathExtractor, DbClientManager dbClientManager, QueryResponseValidator queryResponseValidator)
      Constructs a DatabaseService with the required dependencies.
      Parameters:
      jsonPathExtractor - Utility for extracting specific values from query results using JSONPath.
      dbClientManager - Manages database client connections.
      queryResponseValidator - Validates query responses against assertions.

  • Method Details

    • query

      public QueryResponse query(DbQuery<?> query)
      Executes a database query and retrieves the result.
      Parameters:
      query - The query to execute.
      Returns:
      The query response containing the result set.

    • query

      public <T> T query(DbQuery<?> query, String jsonPath, Class<T> resultType)
      Executes a query and extracts a specific value using JSONPath.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type parameter for the extracted value.
      Parameters:
      query - The query to execute.
      jsonPath - The JSONPath expression to extract a value.
      resultType - The expected type of the extracted value.
      Returns:
      The extracted value.

    • validate

      public <T> List<io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.AssertionResult<T>> validate(QueryResponse queryResponse, io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.Assertion... assertions)
      Validates a query response against a set of assertions.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The expected result type.
      Parameters:
      queryResponse - The query response to validate.
      assertions - The assertions to apply.
      Returns:
      A list of assertion results indicating pass or failure.

    • queryAndValidate

      public <T> List<io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.AssertionResult<T>> queryAndValidate(DbQuery<?> query, io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.Assertion... assertions)
      Executes a query and validates its response against assertions.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The expected result type.
      Parameters:
      query - The query to execute.
      assertions - The assertions to validate against.
      Returns:
      A list of assertion results indicating pass or failure.
